message: Let's start with a fair split. Take it or leave it?
You're getting closer, but I'm still the one who needs to be convinced.
I'm willing to compromise, but not that much!
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet.
I'm trying to get closer to my target, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to meet you halfway... again.
I'm not giving up, I'm going for a bigger share!
I'm willing to give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not going to give up everything.
I'm going for the win, I think I can get a better deal!
I'm not going to give up, but I'm willing to make a final offer.
I'm going all in, I think I can get the whole pie!
